description:
Description:

This position will be responsible for overall revenue growth and the marketing of core services, (following up on leads and calling on potential customers) in both small and large medical facilities, within a geographic territory.

Requirements:

1. 3+ years of experience selling in an inpatient or outpatient healthcare environment or equivalent sales experience in a different industry

2. Demonstrable track record of growth in his/her sales territory

3. Proven ability to build lasting relationships with clients and internal customers to facilitate growth

4. Excellent personal and professional presentation skills

5. Travel 60%
